import DarkApe from '../assets/DarkApe.png' import { useSelector , useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { loadBalances } from '../store/interactions' import { useEffect } from 'react' const Balance = () => { const symbols = useSelector(state => state.tokens.symbols) useEffect(() => { loadBalances(dispatch, exchange, tokens, accounts) }) return (

Balance

Token

); } export default Balance;
